resources.string: Everything you need to move in Rennes, France
Some informations can not be fetched. Please verify your network.
The location service is disabled. Enable it in system parameters.

(Recommended) Stops and stations positions will be downloaded in advance, this operation will take a few seconds using 3G network or a few minutes using Edge. Then, map navigation will be smoother and quicker. Please note the application will still need an Internet access to work properly.
Stops and stations positions will be downloaded on the fly depending on where you move the map. Every scroll on the map will require a few seconds for the stops and stations to be loaded.
%s removed from bookmarks because it\'s not available anymore
